name: Examples-opentox
body:
examples-opentox
================

Coming soon!
----------------

How to call [OpenTox](http://opentox.org "OpenTox")  REST web services for predictive toxicology.

Examples with [Ambit REST web services](http://ambit.sf.net "AMBIT REST web srevices")

 * Searching for chemical structures (exact search, similarity, substructure)
 * Visualisation
 * Running remote descriptor calculations
 * Launching remote predictive models
 * Building remote predictive models
tagline: How to call OpenTox  REST web services
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
